title: The CCB
description: Understanding monthly support for families with children.

content.title: What is the CCB?
content.text: The Canada Child Benefit (CCB) is a tax-free monthly payment made to eligible families to help with the cost of raising children under 18. The amount is based on your family's net income from your tax return.

quiz.question: Is the CCB payment considered taxable income?
quiz.explanation: The CCB is a tax-free benefit, meaning you do not pay income tax on the money you receive from it.
